Four wires with circular cross sections are all made from the same material and have the same length of <math alttext="3.0 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></math>. The wires are at the temperatures and have the cross-sectional diameters shown in the table. If the wire material is a typical non-ohmic conductor, which wire has the highest resistance?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
